column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " I hope you have n't been waiting long . "
#Text=Asami says : " Only three years .
#Text=" Asami says : " And I 'm loving the hair .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thanks .
#Text=You 're looking snazzy as always .
#Text=" Asami says : " Come on .
#Text=Mako got us a table at the restaurant .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra !
#Text=" Korra says : " Hi , Mako .
#Text=" Wu says : " Hello there , Prince Wu , rightful heir to the throne and this guy 's boss .
#Text=I bet he 's told you a lot about me .
#Text=" Korra says : " Nope .
#Text=Not a thing .
#Text=" Wu says : " Then we have so much to talk about .
#Text=You are going to love the food here , I know the chef personally .
#Text=Let 's start with a round of your spicy octopus fritters and keep the cucumber - aloe water coming !
#Text=Got ta keep this princely skin hydrated .
#Text=" Asami says : " I thought it was going to be the three of us .
#Text=" Mako says : " Sorry , but I could n't ditch him .
#Text=But he promised to be on his best behavior .
#Text=" Wu says : " Hey , pop into the Avatar State for me .
#Text=I want to see your eyes glow .
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=No !
#Text=" Asami says : " So can you go into the Avatar State again ?
#Text=I was worried when you told me you could n't .
#Text=" Mako says : " Wait , when did she tell you she could n't ?
#Text=What 's going on with you two ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I wrote to Asami while I was away .
#Text=I asked her not to tell you .
#Text=I 'm sorry .
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , why did n't you ever write to me ?
#Text=Or Bolin ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't know .
#Text=I guess ... I did n't know what to say .
#Text=" Mako says : " " Hello " would have been nice .
#Text=" Wu says : " Mako , if it makes you feel any better , she did n't write me either .
#Text=" Mako says : " Why would she ... Never mind .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry I did n't stay in touch , but I 'm back now .
#Text=And I wan na know everything about what 's been going on with you two .
#Text=" Asami says : " Well , I kind of have some big news .
#Text=I went to visit my father for the first time .
#Text=He had been writing me letters and I guess I finally felt ready to try and forgive him .
#Text=" Korra says : " You sure you can trust him ?
#Text=He might just be manipulating you again .
#Text=" Asami says : " You think I do n't know what my own father is capable of ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No , I did n't mean ... " Asami says : " You do n't get to disappear for three years and then act like you know what 's best for me !
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's not like I planned to be gone for that long , I wanted to come back , but I never felt ready until now .
#Text=" Wu says : " As much as I 'm enjoying this little catch - up , my royal bladder is about to explode .
#Text=Mako , come on , I need you to stand guard .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm not gon na hold your hand every time you have to empty your " royal bladder " .
#Text=Go to the bathroom on your own for once .
#Text=" Wu says : " Fine .
#Text=" Korra says : " Do you always go to the bathroom with him ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't go with him , with him , I just stand there in the general vicinity while he ... I do n't wan na talk about it .
#Text=" Bathroom attendant says : " Good afternoon , Sir .
#Text=Perhaps a spritz of cologne , to freshen up ?
#Text=" Wu says : " Make it a double , buddy !
#Text=" Wu says : " Mako , help !
#Text=Wu ... down ... "
